string-array.name: Reminders
string-array.item: Remember to give yourself some break from your tasks, an overwhelmed brain has no use
Remember to stay hydrated,it will help your brain performance as well as your health
Remember to have a good amount of sleep, your brain need to rest just like machines
Remember to ask for help when needed, as humans we complement each other

string-array.name: Happy_Q
string-array.item: If you can smile, you can be the light, be a beacon of light for someone
Very little is needed to make a happy life, help others to achieve it if possible

string-array.name: Sad_Q
string-array.item: Ask for help, every wolf needs to run with a wolf pack every now and then
Cheer up and stand strong, what the fire does not consume, will consume the fire
Its is okay, moods are like melodies. They go up, they go down and sometimes.
The sun is shining, you should too.
Keep trying, you will get there.

string-array.name: Neutral_Q
string-array.item: If no one tells you something is impossible, then it is still possible, so GO DO IT
Forge onward, fear not and stand ready, your deeds shape your future
Until they stop you, keep going.
The focused mind can pierce through stone
